function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global contagion of infectious diseases","Impact":"High death toll, economic disruption, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Investment in global and urban healthcare infrastructure, early detection and response systems, and public health education","Technologies":"Data analytics for early detection, telemedicine for remote healthcare, and urban planning for disease prevention","People":"Global population, urban residents, and healthcare workers","Owner":"World Health Organization, national governments, and local healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Urban marginalization and disease outbreaks","Impact":"Disproportionate impact on disadvantaged urban populations","Mitigation":"Equitable access to healthcare, social support systems, and urban development planning","Technologies":"Telehealth for remote healthcare access, digital health records for marginalized communities, and community-based healthcare initiatives","People":"Disadvantaged urban residents, public health organizations, and urban development agencies","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Response to contagious cities","Impact":"Challenges in urban planning, public health management, and community living","Mitigation":"Adoption of urban design for disease prevention, investment in public health infrastructure, and community engagement for health promotion","Technologies":"Smart city technology for disease surveillance, urban data analytics for population movement, and telecommunity platforms for healthcare outreach","People":"Urban residents, city planners, and public health authorities","Owner":"City governments, urban planners, and public health organizations"}]}
